task.title: Data Call Capability Tutorial
task.shortdesc: This tutorial describes how to get the capabilities of a data call.

step.cmd: Use RMobileCall::GetMobileDataCallCaps() to get the capability of the data call.
step.info: Capabilities are encapsulated in a RMobileCall::TMobileCallDataCapsV1 object

step.cmd: Use RMobileCall::NotifyMobileDataCallCapsChange() to get the notification of any changes in the capabilities.
Use RMobileCall::GetMobileDataCallRLPRange() to get the Radio Link Protocol (RLP) parameter ranges.
step.info: Retrieve the values of minimum and maximum retransmission attempts with this function.

example.title: Data call capability example
example.p: The following code tests if the call supports a data rate of at least 9600 baud.
